mean_en: the length, width, height, or depth of something : a measurement in one direction (such as the distance from the ceiling to the floor in a room)
word_etyma: dimension维度 + al形容词后缀 → dimensional 维度的
sentence: When I add shading to the drawing it makes it look three dimensional.
sentence_trans: 我给画加上阴影之后，它看起来很立体。
